sourceMeaningMnemonic: Your magic <radical>yoga</radical> <radical>brush</radical> lets you <kanji>build</kanji> what's in your mind's eye.
meaningInfo: You do the bridge pose, and in your mind you imagine your brush painting an actual bridge. When you open your eyes, there it is! A bridge has been built, leading straight to your front door.
readingMnemonic: You <kanji>build</kanji> a bridge. Immediately after, someone is climbing up onto it. It's <reading>Ken</reading> (<ja>けん</ja>) the samurai. He waves at you and says, "Did you build this? The craftsmanship is amazing."
readingInfo: It seems like Ken the samurai really appreciates your building skills.
